import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; // å¯¼å…¥å›¾ç‰‡èµ„æºï¼ˆç¡®ä¿æ–‡ä»¶åœ¨ src/images ä¸‹ï¼‰ import squirrelImg from './images/Squirrel.png'; import penguinImg from './images/Penguin.png'; import owlImg from './images/Owl.png'; import foxImg from './images/Fox.png'; import raccoonImg from './images/Raccoon.png'; import cheetahImg from './images/Cheetah.png'; import goldenRetrieverImg from './images/GoldenRetriever.png'; import capybaraImg from './images/Capybara.png'; // å®šä¹‰å„ä¸ªåŠ¨ç‰©çš„è¯¦ç»†æ•°æ® const animalData = { squirrel: { name: 'Squirrel', subtitle: 'The Over-Prepared Budgeter', description: "If financial responsibility were a sport, you'd be the MVP. Squirrels stash away acorns obsessivelyâ€”just like you meticulously budget and save for the future. Youâ€™re always three steps ahead, ensuring your bank account is padded for every possible scenarioâ€”because you never know when a financial 'winter' will hit.", strengths: "âœ… Hyper-organized with financesâ€”probably has a color-coded spreadsheet for tracking expenses.\nâœ… Rarely caught off guard by unexpected costs.\nâœ… Disciplined saver, great at sticking to financial goals.", weaknesses: "âŒ Overthinks every purchaseâ€”even small, guilt-free splurges.\nâŒ Might hesitate to invest or spend money on experiences.\nâŒ Can stress over finances even when thereâ€™s no reason to.", waysToImprove: "ðŸ”¹ Allow yourself to enjoy your money occasionallyâ€”your savings wonâ€™t collapse because you bought a latte.\nðŸ”¹ Diversify savings by investing, so your money grows rather than just sitting in a low-interest account.\nðŸ”¹ Set a fun budget so you can spend without guilt while staying financially responsible.", detailImage: squirrelImg, iconImage: squirrelImg, }, penguin: { name: 'Penguin', subtitle: 'Debt Fighter', description: "Penguins are resilient, always pushing forward through harsh conditionsâ€”just like you with your debt repayment strategy. Your top priority is tackling loans, credit card balances, or student debt with laser focus. Every extra dollar goes toward getting rid of what you owe.", strengths: "âœ… Highly disciplined with moneyâ€”stays on top of payments.\nâœ… Likely has an airtight repayment plan and a solid understanding of credit scores.\nâœ… Less likely to fall into financial traps or impulsive spending.", weaknesses: "âŒ So focused on paying off debt that they forget to save or enjoy life.\nâŒ Might avoid investing due to fear of financial risk.\nâŒ Can be overly cautious, missing opportunities to grow wealth.", waysToImprove: "ðŸ”¹ Balance debt repayment with building an emergency fundâ€”donâ€™t put every extra dollar into loans.\nðŸ”¹ Start small with investing while paying off debt, even if itâ€™s just a few dollars a month.\nðŸ”¹ Allow yourself occasional guilt-free spending so life isnâ€™t all about financial sacrifice.", detailImage: penguinImg, iconImage: penguinImg, }, owl: { name: 'Owl', subtitle: 'The Investment Guru', description: "Wise and strategic, the owl is always thinking long-term. Youâ€™ve been tracking the stock market since before it was cool, and you know that compound interest is your best friend. You focus on making money work for you rather than just working for money.", strengths: "âœ… Highly knowledgeable about investing and financial growth.\nâœ… Prioritizes long-term wealth building over short-term spending.\nâœ… Rarely makes impulsive financial decisions.", weaknesses: "âŒ Can be too cautious, overanalyzing opportunities and delaying action.\nâŒ Might avoid spending on personal enjoyment, even when affordable.\nâŒ Can overcomplicate simple financial decisions.", waysToImprove: "ðŸ”¹ Donâ€™t let analysis paralysis stop you from taking actionâ€”sometimes, the best investment is simply starting.\nðŸ”¹ Allow yourself to spend on things that bring you happiness in the present.\nðŸ”¹ Educate others on investingâ€”your knowledge could help friends and family grow their wealth too.", detailImage: owlImg, iconImage: owlImg, }, fox: { name: 'Fox', subtitle: 'The Balanced Planner', description: "Clever and resourceful, the fox knows how to get the best deals while staying financially responsible. You have a balanced approachâ€”saving and investing wisely, but also knowing when to treat yourself. Youâ€™re the type to stack discounts, use cashback apps, and maximize credit card rewards like a pro.", strengths: "âœ… Smart with moneyâ€”finds ways to save without extreme sacrifices.\nâœ… Balances financial planning with enjoying life.\nâœ… Always looking for ways to optimize spending and earning.", weaknesses: "âŒ Might overthink financial decisions, leading to indecisiveness.\nâŒ Can sometimes take too long to commit to big purchases.\nâŒ May miss out on investing in riskier but rewarding opportunities.", waysToImprove: "ðŸ”¹ Donâ€™t stress too much over small financial optimizationsâ€”sometimes, time is more valuable than saving a few dollars.\nðŸ”¹ Take calculated investment risks instead of always playing it safe.\nðŸ”¹ Focus on long-term financial goals rather than just short-term wins.", detailImage: foxImg, iconImage: foxImg, }, raccoon: { name: 'Raccoon', subtitle: 'The Resourceful Hustler', description: "Raccoons thrive on resourcefulness, making the most out of anything they find. Youâ€™re the same wayâ€”always looking for a side hustle, finding creative ways to earn money, and stretching every dollar. You might be reselling, flipping items, or cashing in on every deal possible.", strengths: "âœ… Excellent at finding new income streams and making money.\nâœ… Quick thinkerâ€”adapts to financial situations easily.\nâœ… Knows how to get value out of every dollar spent.", weaknesses: "âŒ Lacks financial stabilityâ€”money comes and goes quickly.\nâŒ Not the best at long-term financial planning.\nâŒ Might rely too much on hustle culture rather than structured savings.", waysToImprove: "ðŸ”¹ Create a consistent financial planâ€”hustles are great, but stable savings matter too.\nðŸ”¹ Start investing some of your extra earnings so money works for you.\nðŸ”¹ Track income and expenses more carefully to avoid living paycheck to paycheck.", detailImage: raccoonImg, iconImage: raccoonImg, }, cheetah: { name: 'Cheetah', subtitle: 'The Impulsive Spender', description: "Just like a cheetah, your money moves fastâ€”and usually straight out of your account. You love spontaneity, from last-minute trips to impulse shopping sprees. Life is meant to be lived, and you donâ€™t want financial worries to slow you down.", strengths: "âœ… Enjoys life without financial anxiety.\nâœ… Generous and fun-lovingâ€”always up for an adventure.\nâœ… Great at making memorable experiences.", weaknesses: "âŒ Poor savings habitsâ€”future-you is always left picking up the pieces.\nâŒ High risk of debt and financial instability.\nâŒ Avoids budgeting or financial planning.", waysToImprove: "ðŸ”¹ Set automatic savings so some of your money is stashed away before you spend it.\nðŸ”¹ Use a budgeting app to track spending without feeling restricted.\nðŸ”¹ Give yourself a 'fun fund' so you can enjoy life while still saving responsibly.", detailImage: cheetahImg, iconImage: cheetahImg, }, goldenRetriever: { name: 'Golden Retriever', subtitle: 'The Generous Spender', description: "You have a heart of goldâ€”always treating friends, covering bills, and surprising people with gifts, your generosity knows no bounds. You love making others happy, even if it means stretching your own finances too thin.", strengths: "âœ… Generous and thoughtfulâ€”always willing to help.\nâœ… Creates strong relationships by showing appreciation through gifts.\nâœ… Finds happiness in giving rather than hoarding wealth.", weaknesses: "âŒ Struggles to say no, even when money is tight.\nâŒ Can sacrifice personal financial security for others.\nâŒ Likely to overspend on social obligations.", waysToImprove: "ðŸ”¹ Set a budget for generosityâ€”give, but not at the expense of your own needs.\nðŸ”¹ Practice saying no when neededâ€”helping others shouldnâ€™t leave you struggling.\nðŸ”¹ Focus on non-monetary ways to show appreciation, like quality time.", detailImage: goldenRetrieverImg, iconImage: goldenRetrieverImg, }, capybara: { name: 'Capybara', subtitle: 'The Chill Saver', description: "Unbothered and stress-free, the capybara is all about balance. You donâ€™t obsess over finances, but you also donâ€™t make reckless decisions. You save just enough, spend just enough, and keep life moving at a relaxed pace.", strengths: "âœ… Stays calm about moneyâ€”no panic, no stress.\nâœ… Avoids extreme spending habits.\nâœ… Enjoys life without overcomplicating finances.", weaknesses: "âŒ Too passiveâ€”may miss opportunities to grow wealth.\nâŒ Might not be proactive about long-term financial planning.\nâŒ Relies on 'it'll work out' rather than taking action.", waysToImprove: "ðŸ”¹ Start setting financial goals, even if theyâ€™re simple.\nðŸ”¹ Consider investing so your savings grow over time.\nðŸ”¹ Take a more active role in planning for future expenses.", detailImage: capybaraImg, iconImage: capybaraImg, }, }; const animalKeys = Object.keys(animalData); const IntroductionPage = () => { const [selectedAnimal, setSelectedAnimal] = useState('penguin'); const animal = animalData[selectedAnimal]; return (

{animal.name}

{animal.subtitle}

Who am I?

{animal.description}

Strength

{animal.strengths}

Weakness

{animal.weaknesses}

Ways to Improve

{animal.waysToImprove}

{animalKeys.map((key) => (
setSelectedAnimal(key)} >
))}
); }; export default IntroductionPage;
